caption: The food is absolutely delicious. It's inside Ohana Hale Market Place. They were friendly and welcoming. The portion are far better than what was expected. Thank you for having us! They should be on your must try list.
Food was great and portion size very satisfying. Staff was super friendly. Thank you Waffle and Berry. If you go in the entrance by Korean Bbq, they are in a small booth in the back.
This place is AMAZING!!!!! If you are in Oahu do yourself a favor and go eat!!! Aloha ❤️ Oklahoma love

Cal and Elle are some of the kindest people on the planet. They made us feel so welcome. The food was presented extremely well and the flavors mixed together so perfectly. I had the peanut and guava and the kids had chocolate chip and banana. My only modification is that I might order a half next time. They are very filling and I over ate to finish and not feel guilty by wasting food that was clearly made with love and kindness. I’ll be making this a must stop on future trips. On a side note the mall had very similar pricing on cloths and gifts than the famous swap meet. Support these kind people and get good deals.
The açaí was amazing with a really smooth texture and just the right level of sweetness. The chocolate waffle was also super delicious. The 🍯 honey they have on the side is high quality too.
If I could give this place more stars I would! Ella and Cal are the best!! They are so genuine and quick when serving us. Definitely coming back again. THE FOOD WAS AMAZING
Amazing waffles! So filling and absolutely delicious. Calvin and Ellis were super friendly and he checked to see if we were enjoying our food. Come here - you won’t regret it!

My first review on google, that shows how much I enjoyed my visit. The owner greeted me with so much happiness, shared a sample Of their acaii, and ensured that I liked what I ordered. And it was delicious! Will definitely come back when I’m in the area.

Kal is very friendly and helpful. Located in the back left corner of the market, waffle and berry provides the best açaí bowl in Honolulu with great portions and a large serving of fruit toppings.  Waffles are crispy and flavorful!  Highly recommend and will return.
Big portions and very yummy! Cali is very kind and is happy to modify anything. Highly recommend!
Wonderful customer service and the waffles were delicious 👍🏻👍🏻
Absolutely AMAZING waffle and acai bowl!! The Acai is so creamy and flavorful. Best I've had on island. Great service and staff.
Nicest staff I've ever met. Amazing waffles too! Was nice enough to help me carry my order and find seating! Thanks a lot guys! Best experience I had in hawaii

This place literally is the best. Don’t even question it just go. Walked up and got greeted with straight happiness. Everything was PERFECT I got the chocolate waffles with bananas and they actually let you custom make the waffles. The mojitos was just 😍😍. I’m a picky person when it comes to allowing people to cook for me and let me tell you they just blew me away with how clean they are. Just go you won’t regret it.

This place was amazing. The waffles were crispy, serving size was more than expected (half size recommended), and the mojito was freshly made. They let us sample the açaí berry they had and it was phenomenal. Highly recommend this place!!

I havn't written a review in forever. That goes to show these people deserve recognition. Friendly service, great ice cream, amazing waffles. If these people don't receive a 5* review from others then there is no justice in the world.

Ordered the medium for 9$ and it is huge, includes ALL toppings for FREE (banana, strawberry, blueberry, kiwi, orange, honey, granola, extra granola, chia seeds, coconut shavings, bee pollen!!) The guy there was so nice as well as you can see below  Honestly anywhere else compared to here is a rip off.
Top notch food and service, thanks Cal! Açaí is soo good

This place, the staff, and the food are awesome and filled with aloha! Cal was generous with his time and shared a bit about his story and path to opening Waffle and Berry. Ella's chocolate chip waffle with acai (half of our order is pictured) was blissful and large enough to split with after a day at the beach. The homemade whipped cream and acai were perfect consistency. The add-on bar with cacao nibs, coconut, honey, and other goodies were the figurative cherry on top. We do not make it to town often with the COVID situation, but when we do, we will make Waffle and Berry a regular stop. Cheers!
Tucked in a corner of the Ohana Hale Marketplace. Delicious waffles and acai! Wonderful friendly service! We will definitely be back!

Man this place is the best! Couldn’t find it from Google maps, and when I called the store, they picked up right away and even said they could meet me outside. It’s inside of the Ohana grocery store. Two of the nicest people you could meet working here. They also helped me carry my food to the seating area.  Exactly what I wanted after a rough morning. I skipped breakfast and lunch to go all out here and it was worth it! Prices are great for what you get. I got about four meals worth of food for $25. Chocolate chip banana waffle with fresh whipped cream and vanilla ice cream. Waffle was soft inside, fresh, and had great flavor on its own. Top quality ingredients! Açaí bowl was also amazing with any number of toppings you could want. Fruit was super fresh and delicious. Pictures are as good as they look.  Owner was working and it’s obvious he cares about making great products and making his customers happy. Support a locally owned small business! Will come back again 100%.
Really like their açaí bowl but tried Waffle today.  Peanut butter and jelly lunch heaven!

Jordan and Cal are both extremely nice and helpful. It was an absolute pleasure to do business with them. We found waffle and berry because of the good reviews. It's in the back left corner of the Ohana Hale Marketplace on Ward Ave.  We got acai bowls and three different waffles (chocolate, Nutella, and peanut butter themed). The waffles were good and the fruits that were used were all beautiful and tasty. The acai bowl was beautiful and delicious as well. I've probably tried around five different acai bowls elsewhere and this was my favorite. The texture and flavor of the acai was soooo good!  If you're looking for quality waffles or acai bowls, I would highly recommend Waffle and Berry.

Our family recently “discovered” this hidden gem in the “Ohana Hale Market”!  We LOVE açaí bowls and have tried ALOT of places.  The owners are so friendly, which makes this place even more enjoyable to buy from!  Their açaí bowl is by far THE BEST we’ve tasted!  The açaí is really thick and creamy (unlike most places where the açaí melts fast), and loaded with fresh fruit!  Not to mention the free condiments you can top it off with like honey, finely shredded coconut, chia seeds, and more!  We also had the non-alcoholic kiwi mojito and it was DEEELICIOUS and so refreshing!  Can’t wait to try their waffle dishes, as other customers said those are awesome as well!
Simply the best açaí bowl I have ever consumed in my life! And the best service. The two owners not only serve, they treat customers like family.
If you love waffles, this is definitely a must try. Service here is amazing! They are so welcoming.
Food was soooo delicious! The only thing better was the amazing service!! Highly recommend

Oh man, this spot is incredible! It’s tucked in the back corner of Ohana hale market place.  Prices are reasonable and you can get a smaller portion than what’s on the menu.  Jordan was super helpful! I’ll be hitting them up again.
This is simply the best place for your desert waffle fix.😎 But, keep in mind a full order is big.🤯 And for all you keto dieters out there the Chaffle is super good.😋

My wife and I were around the area the other day and hadn't eaten breakfast yet. It was already afternoon but my wife wanted pancakes. So I researched the area to find this place instead. Initially, we got lost because we didn't know it was inside the new marketplace. So, I called for directions. When we finally found the place, we were welcomed by the owner and his worker. They were very friendly and provided phenomenal customer service! The waffles were delicious too! They offer different waffle flavors and various toppings. They also sell acai bowls and virgin mojitos. There are also additional self-serve toppings like honey, cocoa chips, etc.
Got the peanut butter. Amazing service and waffles. Must try

These are the best waffles I've ever had! I got chocolate chip waffles with banana on top. They also put ice cream and whipped cream on top which was delicious! The owners provided amazing service as well. They were friendly, funny, and made the whole experience perfect. While we were waiting, they gave us tiny little açai cups and even made us a complimentary mojito mocktail (they made sure to specify there was no alcohol in it 😂)! That was so delicious, I probably could have drank 5 of them! Overall, it was one of my favorite experiences while visiting Hawaii and I look forward to going back again.
Amazing açaí bowls! Really reasonable pricing too! The service was great, just from a small little booth in the market place. But I definitely will come back soon to try their waffles.
I’ve had the peanut butter waffles two weekends in a row now. Simply amazing breakfast and the guys that run it are awesome.

Had a serious Belgian waffle craving that these guys put to rest. I hadn't been here before and when I say I had a serious craving I mean I even packed a little squeeze bottle with real maple syrup because these kinds of places only ever have the cheap gluggy corn syrup stuff right? Wrong! That little plastic ramekin top right of my pic is Canadian maple syrup! 😚👌 The plate I got with the fruit salad, ice cream (with chocolate syrup), and acai pictured was $12.55 after tax and before 20% tip - a great value in my opinion. And the guys working there are super friendly. I called to make sure they were open because not all the Ohana Hale places are consistent with their hours, but W&B are reliable. Last bit not least, the waffle itself was top notch.

These were honestly the BEST WAFFLES we ever had. They look as good as in the online photos and taste even better. The fruits were freshly cut and the presentation of the waffles with the fruits, ice cream and sauce looked not just like a simple dessert but more like a perfect composition. Also, the staff was great. We will definitely be back!
